response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily life or business operations. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to us, reflecting the quality and value it brings. For you, the decision to invest in this product could lead to significant improvements in your specific area of interest. Considering its unparalleled capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it for $15,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your requirements and budget, so we can discuss further details.", "product_price": 15000}
